definition: low/beneath/to lower (one's head)/to let droop/to hang down/to incline
to go/to take/sentence-final interrogative particle/variant of 於|于[yu2]

sentences.english: If the temperature is below 0℃ please use Varlon Brand anti-freeze glass cleaner.
sentences.chinese: 如气温低于此温度，可使用慧霖牌防冻型玻璃水。

sentences.english: For hydrophilic materials, the contact angle will be lower than 90 degrees.
sentences.chinese: 亲水性材料的接触角度会低于90度。

sentences.english: When ambient temperature is lower than 0℃, The setting rate of SSLD Wille be decreased.
sentences.chinese: 当温度低于0℃时，前者的硬化速度明显降低。

sentences.english: It was found that the gain of body weight of the high Se group was significantly lower than that of adequate Se group.
sentences.chinese: 结果发现高硒饲料组大鼠的体重明显低于适硒饲料组。

sentences.english: The content of phosphatide in anser eggs was higher than goose's significantly.
sentences.chinese: 大雁卵中磷脂含量明显低于鹅卵。

sentences.english: Your son sets low personal standards and then consistently fails to achieve them.
sentences.chinese: 令郎自设低于常人的标准，又老是达不到。

sentences.english: In-theatre mortality was lower than reported for similar settings.
sentences.chinese: 手术室死亡率低于类似情况下报告的死亡率。

sentences.english: Fine, until that asset is worth less than the outstanding loan.
sentences.chinese: 等到这笔财产的价值低于未偿贷款的时候，罚款。

sentences.english: The dilemma is that not one single country within the EU is below the 3% limit, not even Germany.
sentences.chinese: 事实是包括德国在内，没有一个国家刺字低于3%。

sentences.english: However, 63% of patients had less than 9th-grade numeracy skills.
sentences.chinese: 然而63%的病人计算能力低于9年级水平。

sentences.english: They are also far below levels in many mountainside hot spots farther away.
sentences.chinese: 它的辐射水平也远低于那些山腰间的高辐射点。

sentences.english: Results The cell livability of continuous exposure chemotherapy group was significantly lower than that of the group from once exposure chemotherapy.
sentences.chinese: 结果持续给药组细胞存活率显著低于一次性给药组。

sentences.english: The comment page must have no less than PR2.
sentences.chinese: 注释页必须不低于PR2的少。

sentences.english: She won the championship with a performance of 13-under in the four rounds.
sentences.chinese: 她并以4轮低于标准杆13杆的成绩顺利摘下后冠。

sentences.english: The calcium tolerance of phosphonic acid is lower than polymer type scale inhibitors.
sentences.chinese: 有机膦酸的钙容忍度低于聚合物防垢剂。

definition: to be on the low side/to be inadequate (e.g. of a salary)
to decline/to drop/to fall/to go down/to decrease
to be on the high side/to be unusually high
low/beneath/to lower (one's head)/to let droop/to hang down/to incline
to stay level (of exchange rate, market share etc)/fair/unbiased
to exceed/to overstep/to go too far/to encroach
